DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a new non-contact biometer, is as accurate as the the available gold-standard.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Study for a Non-Contact Biometer
DOC.detailed_description: The features of a not yet commercial available new biometer will be compared to available contact and non contact biometers in different patient groups.
DOC.criteria: 1. 18 year or older 2. Normal eye 3. Cataract 4. Corneal abnormality (scar, opacity, transplant) 5. refractive corneal surgery 6. Pseudophakia 7. Aphakia 8. Silicon oil 9. refractive IOL 2.9. (at least one yes)
